workflow.name: Automatic email categorization & labeling in Zoho Mail with GPT-4o-mini
workflow.description:
# üìß AI-Powered Email Categorization & Labeling in Zoho Mail

This n8n template demonstrates how to use **AI text classification** to automatically categorize incoming emails in Zoho Mail and apply the correct label (e.g., Support, Billing, HR). It saves time by keeping your inbox structured and ensures emails are routed to the right category.

### Use cases include:
- Routing customer support requests to the correct team.
- Organizing billing and finance communications separately.
- Streamlining HR and recruitment email handling.
- Reducing inbox clutter and ensuring no important message is missed.

---

## ‚ÑπÔ∏è Good to know
- You‚Äôll need to configure **Zoho OAuth credentials** ‚Äî see [Self Client Overview](#), [Authorization Code Flow](#), and [Zoho Mail OAuth Guide](#).
- The **labels must already exist in Zoho Mail** (e.g., Support, Billing, HR). The workflow fetches these labels and applies them automatically.
- The Zoho Mail API domain changes depending on your account region:
  - `.com` ‚Üí Global accounts (`https://mail.zoho.com/api/...`)
  - `.eu` ‚Üí EU accounts (`https://mail.zoho.eu/api/...`)
  - `.in` ‚Üí India accounts (`https://mail.zoho.in/api/...`)

Example: For an EU account, the endpoint would be:
```bash
https://mail.zoho.eu/api/accounts/<accountID>/updatemessage
```
- The AI model used for text classification may incur costs depending on your provider (e.g., OpenRouter).  
- Start by testing with a small set of emails before enabling for your full inbox.

---

## üîÑ How it works
1. A new email in Zoho Mail triggers the workflow.  
2. OAuth authentication retrieves access to Zoho Mail‚Äôs API.  
3. All available labels are fetched, and a **label map (display name ‚Üí ID)** is created.  
4. The AI model analyzes the subject and body to predict the correct category.  
5. The workflow routes the email to the right category branch.  
6. The matching Zoho Mail label is applied (final node is deactivated by default).  

---

## üõ†Ô∏è How to use
- Create the required labels (e.g., Support, Billing, HR, etc.) in your Zoho Mail account before running the workflow.  
- Replace the **Zoho Mail Account ID** in the *Set Account ID* node.  
- Configure your **Zoho OAuth credentials** in the *Get Access Token* node.  
- Update the API base URL to match your Zoho account‚Äôs region (`.com`, `.eu`, `.in`, etc.).  
- Activate the **Apply Label to Email** node once ready for production.  
- Optionally, adjust categories in the AI classifier prompt to fit your organization‚Äôs needs.  

---

## üìã Requirements
- Zoho Mail account with API access enabled.  
- Labels created in Zoho Mail for each category you want to classify.  
- OAuth credentials set up in n8n.  
- Correct Zoho Mail API domain (`.com`, `.eu`, `.in`) based on your account region.  
- An AI model (via OpenRouter or other provider) for text classification.  

---

## üé® Customising this workflow
This workflow can be adapted to many inbox management scenarios. Examples include:
- Auto-routing customer inquiries to specific departments.  
- Prioritizing VIP client emails with special labels.  
- Filtering job applications directly into an HR-managed folder.  

---

workflow.name: AI-Powered Email Categorization & Labeling in Zoho Mail

categories.description:
Emails where customers ask for help, report problems, or request troubleshooting.
Examples:
‚ÄúI can‚Äôt log into my account.‚Äù
‚ÄúThe app keeps crashing after the update.‚Äù
‚ÄúHow do I reset my password?‚Äù

Emails from potential customers showing interest in products or services. Usually contain inquiries, demo requests, or sales opportunities.
Examples:
‚ÄúI‚Äôd like to learn more about your pricing plans.‚Äù
‚ÄúCan we schedule a demo of your software?‚Äù
‚ÄúWe‚Äôre interested in purchasing licenses for our team.‚Äù

Emails about changes, updates, or management of existing accounts. Includes renewals, cancellations, and upgrades.
Examples:
‚ÄúI‚Äôd like to upgrade my subscription plan.‚Äù
‚ÄúPlease cancel my account.‚Äù
‚ÄúCan I change my billing address?‚Äù

Emails related to invoices, payments, refunds, receipts, and financial queries.
Examples:
‚ÄúI haven‚Äôt received my invoice for July.‚Äù
‚ÄúCan you send me a receipt for my last payment?‚Äù
‚ÄúI‚Äôd like a refund for my subscription.‚Äù

Emails related to hiring, job applications, interviews, and employee management.
Examples:
‚ÄúI‚Äôd like to apply for the marketing manager role.‚Äù
‚ÄúCan we schedule an interview for next week?‚Äù
‚ÄúWe‚Äôre looking for candidates to fill open positions.‚Äù
This is related to emails which is not related to any of the above categories

parameters.content:
## Try It Out!

### This n8n template demonstrates how to use AI to automatically classify and organize incoming emails in **Zoho Mail** by applying the correct label (e.g., Support, Billing, HR, etc.).

Use cases include:

-   Automatically routing customer support requests to the right team.
    
-   Keeping billing and finance emails separate from general communication.
    
-   Streamlining HR and recruitment email handling.
    
-   Reducing inbox clutter and ensuring nothing important is missed.
    

----------

### How it works

-   The workflow is triggered whenever a new email arrives in Zoho Mail.
    
-   Zoho OAuth credentials are used to authenticate and fetch all available labels from your inbox.
    
-   A lookup map is created to match each label‚Äôs **display name ‚Üí label ID**.
    
-   The AI model analyzes the email subject and body to predict the correct category.
    
-   Based on the classification, the workflow routes the email to the corresponding branch.
    
-   Finally, the correct Zoho Mail label is applied (node deactivated by default for safe testing).
    

----------

### How to use

-   Replace the **Zoho Mail Account ID** in the _Set Account ID_ node.
    
-   Configure your **Zoho OAuth credentials** in the _Get Access Token_ node.
    
-   Activate the **AI-Powered Email Categorization & Labeling in Zoho Mail** node once you are ready to run in production.
    
-   Test with sample emails to validate classification before enabling on your live inbox.
    

----------

### Requirements

-   Zoho Mail account with API access enabled.
    
-   Zoho OAuth credentials configured in n8n.
    
-   An AI model (via OpenRouter or other provider) for text classification.

json.textHtml:
Dear [Support/Team Name],

I hope you are doing well.

I would like to upgrade my current subscription plan with [Product/Service Name]. Could you please share the available upgrade options, pricing details, and the process to switch plans?

If possible, I√¢¬Ä¬ôd also appreciate guidance on how the upgrade will affect my existing billing cycle and any pro-rated charges.

Looking forward to your assistance.

Best regards,

Ruthwik
json.textPlain:
Dear [Support/Team Name],

I hope you are doing well.

I would like to upgrade my current subscription plan with *[Product/Service
Name]*. Could you please share the available upgrade options, pricing
details, and the process to switch plans?

If possible, I√¢¬Ä¬ôd also appreciate guidance on how the upgrade will affect my
existing billing cycle and any pro-rated charges.

Looking forward to your assistance.

Best regards,

Ruthwik
